shared.locations

Class EdgeValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.locations.EdgeValue

  • public class EdgeValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the owner and location of the edge
    Author:
    Brennen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EdgeLocation location
      location of the edge (x and y coordinates + a direction)
      private int owner
      Index of the player that owns the edge 0-3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EdgeValue(int owner, EdgeLocation location)
      Constructor for EdgeValue sets the owner and location of the EdgeValue

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EdgeLocation getLocation()
      retrieves the location (x and y coordinates + direction) of the location of the edge
      int getOwner()
      retrieves the owner which is a player index of the edge
      void setLocation(EdgeLocation location)
      Sets the location of the edge Parameter should be an EdgeLocation which contains an x coordinate, a y coordinate, and a direction
      void setOwner(int owner)
      Sets the owner of the edgeValue Parameter should be a player id (0-3)
